name: Level Up! Racing Manager
description:
Become the racing team manager and lead them to glory!

You'll be able to decide about every detail of your team functioning - from buying parts and renegotiating drivers contracts to investing in stock markets and building academy for future stars.

The main idea was to create a good deal of advanced mechanisms around simple and fast race mechanic.Have I succeed? Check out the game and find an answer yourself.

SUPPORTED RESOLUTIONS: FULL HD
